articles.author: Saheli Roy Choudhury
articles.title: Asia-Pacific markets gain in early trade as investors focus on central bank meetings - CNBC
articles.description: Several high profile central banks are due to hold their monetary policy meetings this week, including the U.S. Federal Reserve and the European Central Bank.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE Asia-Pacific markets jumped on Monday as investors turn their focus to a number of monetary policy meetings happening this week.
In Japan, the Nikkei 225 rose 0.91% while the Topix index a… [+2572 chars]
